entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
